subject: desktop-base and KDE
body:
Hi,

on the live systems, we install 'desktop-base' and e.g for gnome[0] or
xfce[1], we get these wonderful backgrounds.

for kde[2], it doesn't seem to work. what am I doing wrong? all
screenshots are etch-based.

Regards,
Daniel

[0] http://debian-live.alioth.debian.org/screenshots/gnome.png
[1] http://debian-live.alioth.debian.org/screenshots/xfce.png
[2] http://debian-live.alioth.debian.org/screenshots/kde.png

--
